meanings.sent1: The overboiled vegetables were mushy and tasteless.
meanings.sent2: The pasta was overboiled and turned into a sticky mess.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally overboiled the eggs until they bounced like rubber balls.
meanings.sent4: The overboiled steak was as tough as shoe leather.
meanings.sent5: The overboiled rice was so soft, it melted in your mouth.

meanings.sent1: The soup was overboiled and lost all its flavor.
meanings.sent2: She stirred the soup too vigorously, causing it to boil overboiled.
meanings.sent3: The pot bubbled overboiled, creating a mess on the stove.
meanings.sent4: The water in the pot boiled overboiled, creating a steamy cloud.
meanings.sent5: The tea kettle whistled loudly when the water inside was overboiled.

meanings.sent1: The overboiled pasta was so soft, it fell apart when touched.
meanings.sent2: The overboiled carrots were like mush in the stew.
meanings.sent3: He overboiled the potatoes until they were like fluffy clouds.
meanings.sent4: The overboiled broccoli florets were limp and unappetizing.
meanings.sent5: The overboiled noodles were so soft, they slipped off the fork easily.
